Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Requires the state to keep state lottery winners identities anonymous
Summary: Requires the state to keep state lottery winners' identities anonymous to the general public unless the lottery winner gives their consent.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to requiring the state to keep state lottery winners identities anonymous to the general public unless the lottery winner gives their consent
